DOC.brief_summary: Verify the changes in coagulation system during total knee replacement surgery with tranexamic acid single bolus infusion.
DOC.detailed_description: The study was set to reveal changes in the coagulation and fibrinolytic systems during total knee surgery and especially during tourniquet placement, tourniquet removal and revascularization of ischemic limb, after tranexamic acid single bolus infusion, and at post operative day 1.
DOC.criteria: Osteoarthrosis TKR operation elective ASA IIII TKR due to any reason but osteoarthrosis known coagulation problems platelets < 100,000/DcL Hb < 12 g% past thromboembolic event treatment with aspiring during last week treatment with NSAID's during last 48 hours malignancy known allergy to tranexamic acid general anesthesia
